name: A Male Saint in Glory
description: A Male Saint in Glory; Attributed to Pedro Atanasio Bocanegra (Spanish, 1638 - 1689); about 1660 - 1689; Pen and brown and grayish brown inks; 16 x 11 cm (6 5/16 x 4 5/16 in.); 94.GA.92; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: A Male Saint in Glory
medium: Pen and brown and grayish brown inks
